info.name: Municipality API - Complete Collection
info.description: Comprehensive API documentation for Municipality Social Project Platform with all endpoints organized by logical flow

item.name: 1. AUTHENTICATION FLOW
item.description: Complete authentication workflow - Register, Verify Email, Login, Reset Password

item.name: 3. SOCIAL PROJECT REGISTRATION & MANAGEMENT
item.description: Social project user registration, project creation, and management

formdata.value: Program to provide educational resources to underserved communities
Updated program description with more details

item.name: 4. PROJECT APPROVALS & DECISIONS (Government)
item.description: Government approval workflows for registrations and projects

item.description: Create, manage, like, and comment on project updates

formdata.value: We have completed the first phase of the project with great success

item.name: 6. CITIZEN SUPPORT & FUNDING
item.description: Citizens support projects and manage their funding contributions

item.name: 7. TOKENS MANAGEMENT
item.description: Token balance, transfer, and issuance management

item.description: Citizens submit proof of payment to claim tokens

item.name: 9. USER PROFILE & SETTINGS
item.description: User profile management, avatar, settings, and account

item.description: Public profile access, user search, and statistics

item.name: 11. MEDIA MANAGEMENT
item.description: Upload and delete project and update media

item.name: 12. COMMENTS
item.description: Create, update, delete comments and get replies

item.name: 13. GOVERNMENT DASHBOARD & ANALYTICS
item.description: Government dashboard, analytics, and ecosystem management

item.description: Ecosystem overview, citizen and project management, allocation limits

item.description: Set, get, and manage allocation limits for projects
